sentences.en: A progression of bare yellow hills mounted toward the distant slopes of Mount Anaka.
sentences.cn: 出现在前面的是一片光秃秃的黄山冈,连绵不断,一路升高,直伸向远处穴河山的山腰里.

sentences.en: Adolescence is the period of progression from childhood to adulthood.
sentences.cn: 青春期是由童年到成年的过渡期.

sentences.en: Both drugs slow the progression of HIV, but neither cures the disease.
sentences.cn: 这两种药物都可以延缓艾滋病病情发展，但是都不能治愈这种疾病。

sentences.en: Creeping is a slow method of progression.
sentences.cn: 爬是一种很慢的行进法.

sentences.en: I believe in progression, in taking risks, in never getting stale.
sentences.cn: 我崇尚进取、冒险和永不倦怠。

sentences.en: I think they saw it as a natural progression for me.
sentences.cn: 我想他们认为这对我来说是顺理成章的。

sentences.en: In most dating relationships there is a natural progression of physical intimacy.
sentences.cn: 在多数约会关系中都有身体亲昵行为的自然进展.

sentences.en: The chart shows the progression of the company in detail.
sentences.cn: 这图详细地显示公司之进步情况.

sentences.en: The involute progression of hallucination is strange.
sentences.cn: 幻觉的复杂的发展过程很奇特.

sentences.en: The progression of the disease can be retarded by early surgery.
sentences.cn: 早期手术可以抑制病情的发展。

sentences.en: The progression of tidal effects is both elegant and stately.
sentences.cn: 潮汐作用的进程既精巧又威严.

sentences.en: The progression price markup system has been a controversial issue.
sentences.cn: 采用级数价格的系统是有争议的事项.

sentences.en: The techniques described above lend themselves admirably to a regular progression along a line of survey.
sentences.cn: 上述方法适用于沿测线有规则地前进.

sentences.en: To me this move seemed like a natural progression.
sentences.cn: 对我来说这次转会就是一次正常的进步.
